title: Churchill
creator_credit: Marisa Appugliese, Jeremy Bennett, ABC-TV (Australia), Arts and Entertainment Network and BBC-TV
brief_description: This magnificent four hour video explores the man behind the war image. With original archive footage of his home life, his extensive political campaigns and of the battles of two world wars, this outstanding film offers a vivid portrait of arguably the greatest statesman Britain has ever known.
